articles.author: Brett Wadelton
articles.title: More malicious Android apps infect thousands of phones in Australia - 7NEWS
articles.description: Android phones are still infected by new stealthy backdoor malware. Are you at risk?
articles.content: Cybersecurity company McAfee has identified a previously unknown Android backdoor named Xamalicious, that has impacted over 340,000 devices through malicious apps available on Google Play, Androids o… [+3510 chars]
